meanings.definition: A device for recording video images.
meanings.sent1: I used the videocam to film my cat playing.
meanings.sent2: The videocam captured the beautiful sunset at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The videocam seemed to have a mind of its own, following me everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a videocam, recording every detail of the room.
meanings.sent5: The videocam's lens was like a window into another world.

meanings.definition: To record video images using a videocam.
meanings.sent1: I videocammed the school play for my parents.
meanings.sent2: She videocams all our family gatherings to cherish the memories.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel videocammed the birds in the garden for fun.
meanings.sent4: His memory videocammed the moment forever in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The videocam silently videocammed the bustling city streets.

meanings.definition: The act of capturing video footage with a videocam.
meanings.sent1: Her videocam of the concert was shaky but full of memories.
meanings.sent2: The videocam's battery died in the middle of the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The videocam's lens got foggy, creating a dreamy effect on the footage.
meanings.sent4: The videocam's zoom captured every detail of the tiny flower.
meanings.sent5: The videocam's screen showed a clear view of the mountain peak.
